title: I Am Schizophrenic: Poetry From A Beautiful Brain
description: This poetry book looks with both a stark and a funny voice on the nature of mental illness (particularly Schizoaffective Depression and Panic Disorder) and how it affects our everyday lives whether we mean for it to or not. It is suitable both for those who are struggling with mental illness and those who have no idea what words like "Schizoaffective Depression" means. For more information on the author she can be found on www.kerenzaryan.com.
author: Kerenza Ryan
